properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 2 at 2:47AM MST until February 4 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches
along and north of the US 40 corridor. Winds could gust as high
as 45 mph mainly along and north of US 40 Monday afternoon
through Tuesday morning.

* WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 10 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times with patchy
blowing snow significantly reducing visibility, especially in
open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 10 AM MST TUESDAY
